name: SIGA-CLUB
desc: Web system to manage the activities and attendance of school clubs.

name: DeepDaemon
desc: CIC web system: upload projects, publications in the Lab CCC, facilitating access and dissemination.

name: Cloud
desc: Web system that allows storing files in the cloud, with a permissions and folders system.

name: Whatsapp bot
desc: WhatsApp bot that allows generating stickers from sent images, connecting to the OpenIA API to generate texts and images.

name: covid-19-model
desc: Python model for classifying X-ray images of patients with COVID-19 and healthy individuals.

name: Tesis-G5
desc: Web repository system to manage thesis projects of the ESCOM.

name: SIGA-ESCOM
desc: Extension for Chromium-based browsers that allows calculating the credits of the elective subject in ESCOM using SIGA-Club.

name: Oracle ONE - Portfolio
desc: Web encryption and currency and temperature converter.

name: Face Recognition
desc: A face recognition that allows identify faces on a picture or with a live video.
